allow:
Bash(lein repl <<'EOF'
\(require '[agent-os.llm.claude-session :as session]\)
\(require '[clj-http.client :as http]\)
\(require '[cheshire.core :as json]\)

;; Try creating API key from existing OAuth token
\(let [creds \(session/get-oauth-credentials-from-file\)
      token \(:access_token creds\)]
  \(println "Token:" \(subs token 0 20\) "..."\)
  \(println "Trying to create API key..."\)
  \(let [result \(session/create-api-key-from-oauth token\)]
    \(println "Result:" result\)\)\)
EOF)

Bash(lein repl <<'EOF'
\(require '[clj-http.client :as http]\)
\(require '[cheshire.core :as json]\)

;; Try using OAuth token directly with Bearer auth
\(let [creds \(json/parse-string \(slurp \(str \(System/getProperty "user.home"\) "/.claude/credentials.json"\)\) true\)
      token \(:access_token creds\)]
  \(println "Using OAuth token directly with Bearer auth..."\)
  \(let [response \(http/post "https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages"
                            {:headers {"Authorization" \(str "Bearer " token\)
                                       "anthropic-version" "2023-06-01"
                                       "content-type" "application/json"}
                             :body \(json/generate-string
                                    {:model "claude-sonnet-4-20250514"
                                     :max_tokens 100
                                     :messages [{:role "user" :content "Say hello in one word"}]}\)
                             :throw-exceptions false}\)]
    \(println "Status:" \(:status response\)\)
    \(println "Body:" \(:body response\)\)\)\)
EOF)
